AboutMe_about_me_text: My name is Marc. I started with computers at the age of 15 and haven't stopped learning since. I love the world of programming and technology in general.
AboutMe_about_me_text2: I have participated in programming contests like Programame, CodeJam, Las 12 Uvas, and have created personal projects. I enjoy learning and sharing knowledge.
